text: @CSIS #Ukraine #WarInUkraine #Russia #InternationalSecurityTwo years have passed since Russia's invasion of Ukraine. The war continues, and it's time to take stock of the situation. Join us for a virtual discussion with experts from the CSIS International Security Program to analyze the state of the conflict, Ukrainian and Russian strategies, and the future of Western aid to Ukraine.We need to talk about the human cost of this war. Thousands have died, millions displaced, and countless lives destroyed. The world must not turn a blind eye to this tragedy. It's time for action, not just words. #UkraineDeservesBetterThe discussion will feature Dr. Seth G. Jones, Dr. Eliot A. Cohen, Emily Harding, and the Honorable Michael Vickers. Their expertise will provide valuable insights into this complex situation. Don't miss it! ðŸ‘‰ CSIS International Security Program #UkraineInTheBalanceWe must support Ukraine in their fight for freedom and democracy. The international community has a responsibility to act. Let's work together to find solutions and bring peace to the region.
